reviews:
Looking at their size chart, I initially bought the small. However, after trying it on, I ended up exchanging it for the medium because I felt it was restricting my movement. I gave the medium a try and here's what I thought:
Pros: warm material, fits reasonably well around the waist
Con: the biggest drawback for this product was the stiffness of the material. I tried it under dress pants, jeans and sweatpants, and what bothered me was that my movement was more restricted by this baselayer than by any of my pants. I really don't think a baselayer should be more stiff and movement-limiting than jeans or dress pants.
I ended up finding cheaper, equally warm, yet much more comfortable baselayer pants at Winners.
For that reason I ended up returning this product. I would not recommend it.
